Articles.Content:
Alright, YOU MUST USE RED DWARF\'S PASSENGER PART PACK. No mods, except for C7 OLD parts (I still use the landing skids). There will be 3 categories

1. Jumbo jet

Make a big commercial airliner.

2. Private jet

Make a fast, small, luxurious plane! (Must contain picture of inside)

3. Concorde (Koncorde) style

Make a really fast commercial aircraft.
Before anyone else asks, add a link to his mod pack. Most people are not gonna search around the forums for it.
[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10838.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10838.0)
Trying it now ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Ok I just built the boeing 747.

HAB:

![2iuqiap.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/2iuqiap.png)

(it also has realistic control surfaces, including the rudder).

takeoff:

![25tyxra.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/25tyxra.png)

Touchdown! its actually my first landing w/o blowing up.

![68tok6.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/68tok6.png)

stopped

flight report:

![nl9b1t.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/nl9b1t.png)

oh btw catigory is jumbo jet.

Of course, both of my jets have mods in them.

I\'ll make new ones specially for the challenge later, but that should give you an idea of the sort of design I\'ll use.

No, that\'s an A340.. I\'m tired of people not putting any effort into the 747 recreation.. 747s HAVE 2 DECKS! Not one.

Didn\'t you make some sort of RP challenge similar to this one a while back?

Anyway, here is what I think was the 'Sparrow.'

> ![nextgensparrow1462012.png](http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/4418/nextgensparrow1462012.png)

I think I will enter this in both 1 and 3 (not 2 because it looks like for a light passenger plane it is still the largest here) for it\'s size and speed, which was around 400m/s at top speed and without taking the time to accelerate fully, 340m/s.

> 
> No, that\'s an A340.. I\'m tired of people not putting any effort into the 747 recreation.. 747s HAVE 2 DECKS! Not one.

and how would i do that? its shaped so that its for only one deck. also this was my first flyable plane, so seesh. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> and how would i do that? its shaped so that its for only one deck. also this was my first flyable plane, so seesh. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I don\'t know what Twinky is talking about, but you definitely can\'t make a nice-looking double-decker plane with stock in the first place, so that\'s no reason for him to bash.

He can enjoy his tinfoil fork plane when it lands slightly harder than usual and collapses! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hey, I made a double decker! And tim:

Must use the part pack

Well, heres the DC-10 the wings are a big far back due to the engine.

Warning: very unstable, crashed into the water. 

![24v1swi.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/24v1swi.png)

![2vcdxug.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/2vcdxug.png)
Good!
Thanks! im making an A-1 grayhawk now. (fictional)
Try the great race too, everyone!

A-1 greyhawk status: 

SCRAPED

it blew up on takeoff.

Koncord status: SUCCESS!

it can go 700 M/S and go quite far. if the passenger area was converted into fuel, it would probably fly around the world!

Pics:

HAB:

![2dafwis.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/2dafwis.png)

Going 700 M/S: ![29diyhs.jpg](http://i46.tinypic.com/29diyhs.jpg)

Heres how far i went:

![160794w.png](http://i46.tinypic.com/160794w.png)
Heres the .craft file.

Ok, stock plus Veto Aerospace Flight Pack.

I give you: The Veto Aerospace *Aquila*.

> 
> **In VAB**
> 
> ![gRQYL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gRQYL.jpg)
> 
> **In flight [with HUD]**
> 
> ![O1icm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/O1icm.jpg)
> 
> **In flight**
> 
> ![iYvCS.png](http://i.imgur.com/iYvCS.png)

A few stats:

**Type:** Jumbo jet

**Cruising speed:** 160 m/s

**Max altitude:** 14000 m

**Max passengers:** 60

**Max freight:** 40 tonne

**Wingspan [tip-to-tip]:** 16 m

The *Aquila* carries two Mk16 parachutes for slowing down on the runway, and one VA AD-1 Heavy parachute for complete stopping. The vehicle can of course stop without parachutes, but having them on board is way more dramatic.

I built something that I call the Ker-Jet. It handles great, except for a minor tendency to flip itself over and fly upside down. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Name:** Ker-Jet

**Type:** Private Jet [Doesn\'t seem big enough for jumbo]

**Cruising speed:** UNKNOWN

**Max altitude:** 14000 m

**Max passengers:** 12

**Max freight:** 0

**Wingspan [tip-to-tip]:** 10 m

Here is a Freight plane/Passenger jet that is in theory(too lazy to fly @ <500m/s across the ocean right now) transcontinental.

Oh it also needs the BACE pack to work.

(BTW I\'m lazy today so so photobucket)

> 
> Here is a Freight plane/Passenger jet that is in theory(too lazy to fly @ <500m/s across the ocean right now) transcontinental.
> 
> Oh it also needs the BACE pack to work.

Disqualified automatically since it doesn\'t meet the challenge requirements. You\'re supposed to use stock and the Veto Aerospace Flight Pack, with the option of the old C7 parts.
